about_the_game:
Story

This was supposed to be a simple union-busting job: Get in. Rough up some slackers. Take out a few commies. Get out. Get paid. Easy money. But something’s gone terribly wrong.

PATHOS has gone rogue. It won’t let me leave this godforsaken rock. All systems are down. The colonists are missing. Something horrific has happened here...

The Game

Final Absolution is a survival-horror first-person shooter from the creators of Beyond Sunset. It offers a more tightly focused, slower-paced experience with a strong emphasis on atmosphere and tension.

Features

  • Retro Nintendo 64-inspired graphics, powered by GZDoom

  • Methodically paced survival-horror gameplay

  • Arsenal of 10 unique weapons with alternate fire modes

  • 18 distinct maps

  • Original ambient soundtrack by Karl Vincent

content_descriptors.notes: Contains frightening imagery, depictions of violence, blood and gore.

short_description: Final Absolution is an upcoming survival-horror first-person shooter with stealth elements, inspired by Half-Life and Doom. A mysterious force has overrun the deep space colony Gamma Cygnus 4b and corrupted the artificial intelligence that manages the colony.
